article.title: Draper Lab to Support Precision Airdrop
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Charles Stark Draper Laboratory, Cambridge, Massachusetts, was awarded an $8,751,371 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for the services in support of the Joint Precision Airdrop System 2K. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Picatinny Arsenal, New Jersey, is the contracting activity.
